title: RP Gifting Sale
body: Hey guys, RP Gifting is unavailable right now which is pretty bad because a friend of mine wanted to buy me a skin as a present, and I told him that Darkstar Varus will be on sale this month, so now we waited on this sale since I read that he'll be an early sale on november and now gifting is disabled, so what am I supposed to do? Should I write a ticket to RIOT because of the sale that will be pretty much lost for me, ty in advance :D

replies.body:
Your friend should encounter zero issues if they launch into the *Legacy Client* and gift you from there! Below is a screenshot showing where they can launch into the Legacy Client from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
I'm Having trouble with gifting RP, is that not supposed to be available?

It's not available at the moment, as mentioned in the client status ticker and on the [service status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).

I don't have an ETA on when it will be re-enabled, but please let me know if you have any other questions.
